name: Xipev
author: Xipev
summary: Vepix backwards. Instead of killing during the night, you kill during the day. Unlike Daypix, you can kill an unlimited amount of times! However, you cannot kill two times in a row; someone else has to kill before you can kill again. If no kills happen during the day, everyone will die!

tips./myrole: Use /myrole to check who is still alive
tips.No Stall: Everyone will die if no one kills during the day

roles.help: Type /Kill [name] during the day to kill!
roles.help2: You can kill as many people as you like! However, you cannot kill two times in a row. You must wait for someone else to kill before you can kill again!
roles.tutorialmsg: You can type /myrole to see who is still alive!
roles.info: Can kill during the day. Sided with Xipev.
